entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value:
def cities = ["Paris", "New York", "Tokyo", "Lagos", "Geneva", "Sydney", "Beijing", "Rio de Janeiro", "Cape Town", "Mumbai"]
cities.each { city -> def flowFile = session.create() // Crée un nouveau FlowFile flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "city", city) // Ajoute l'attribut 'city' avec le nom de la ville session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) // Transfère le FlowFile au prochain processeur }
